item.title: Brethyn Noswaith
item.description: The tip of The Forlorn ShiverThe Forlorn Shiver, is home to an old civilization of men and women who call themselves Brethyn NoswaithBrethyn Noswaith.

item.title: Human Kingdom
item.description: The human empire lives on a far away shardshard known has HearthenHearthen. The human king, a spoiled and lazy scion of a powerful line, has recently been overthrown by his younger sister.

item.title: Light Crusade
item.description: The light Crusade is a religion founded upon the undying flame of the Grand LighthouseGrand Lighthouse which saved Candle StoneCandle Stone from the advancement of the Grave WinterGrave Winter.

item.title: Primevil Speakers
item.description: The Primevil SpeakersPrimevil Speakers are a group of 5 elders who function as the leadership of the Brethyn NoswaithBrethyn Noswaith upon The Forlorn ShiverThe Forlorn Shiver.

item.title: Quill Society
item.description: A society of mages that began the construction of the Arcane AcademyArcane Academy.

item.title: Sparding Family
item.description: Rich noble family with a large castle in the Knuckle MountainsKnuckle Mountains of GrameraiGramerai.

item.title: Wineforth Family
item.description: Rich wine making family on GrameraiGramerai. Hired the PartyParty to “discretely” retake their estate to the east of Candle StoneCandle Stone.

item.title: Ymarferydd
item.description: The Ymarferydd make up a select few members of the Brethyn NoswaithBrethyn Noswaith who can speak directly to the Eidolons of The Forlorn ShiverEidolons of The Forlorn Shiver.
